ruleContent.content:
<js>
function decode() {
	let response = java.get(baseUrl, {});
	let content = String(response.body());
	isPay = !/"content"/.test(content);
	if (isPay) {
		let accesskey = String(response.header("accesskey"));
		let keyString = String(response.header("keystring"));
		let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length;
		let v6 = accesskey.charCodeAt(accesskeyLen - 1);
		let v9 = 0;
		for (var i = 0; i < accesskey.length; i++) {
			v9 += accesskey.charCodeAt(i)
		}
		let v15 = v9 % keyString.length;
		let v17 = Math.floor(v9 / 65);
		let v18 = keyString.length;
		let v43 = keyString.substring(v15, v17 + v15 > v18 ? v18 : v17 + v15);
		let v32 = content.length;
		let [v38, dest] = (v6 & 1) !== 0 ? [content.slice(-12), content.slice(0, -12)] : [content.slice(0, 12), content.slice(12)];
		let key = java.md5Encode(v43 + v38).slice(0, 8);
		let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).slice(0, 8);
		content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(dest)
	}
	return content
}

extend = book.getVariable("custom");

if (!/versionCode/.test(baseUrl)) {
	content = java.getString("$.content");
	upDown = java.getString("$.upDown");
	saybody = java.getString("$.sayBody");
	message = java.getString("$.message");
} else {
	if (/content/.test(result)) {
		java.setContent(result);
	} else {
		java.setContent(decode());
	}

	content = java.getString("$..content");
	if (String(content).length > 30) {
		content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", "KW8Dvm2N", "1ae2c94b").decryptStr(content);
	} else {
		content = "";
	}

	upDown = java.getString("$..upDown");
	saybody = java.getString("$..sayBody");
	message = java.getString("$..message");
	buy_ratio = java.getString("$..buy_ratio");
	reader_buy_ratio = java.getString("$..reader_buy_ratio");
};

chapterintro = java.get("chapterintro");
pointMeassge = java.get("pointmeassge");

content1 = `\t${chapterintro}\n${message}`;
if (pointMeassge != "0æ™‹æ±Ÿå¸") {
	content1 += "\nä»·æ ¼ï¼š" + pointMeassge + "ï¼ˆAPPä¸“äº«ä»·ï¼‰";
}
if (/å…è´¹èµ é€çš„ç¦åˆ©ç•ªå¤–/.test(message)) {
	content1 += "\næœ¬ç¦åˆ©ç•ªå¤–èµ é€ç»™æ­£æ–‡è®¢é˜…ç‡è¾¾åˆ°" + buy_ratio + "çš„è¯»è€…\næ‚¨æˆªæ­¢è‡³ä¸Šä¸€ç« çš„æ­£æ–‡è®¢é˜…ç‡ï¼š" + reader_buy_ratio;
}
saybody = saybody != "" && !(/å…³é—­ä½œè¯/.test(extend) || Map("saybodySwitch") === "å…³é—­ä½œè¯") ? `\tâ–ä½œè€…æœ‰è¯è¯´ï¼š${saybody}` : "";
Content = content == "" ? content1 : (upDown == "0" ? `${saybody}\n‎\n${content}` : `${content}\n${saybody}`);
</js>
ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
c = chapter;
let bbb = String(book.getVariable("custom") || "");
try {
	let isParagraphEnabled = Map("paragraphSwitch") === "on";
	let limitLength = parseInt(Map("paragraphLimit") || "20");
	let sortType = Map("paragraphSort") || "0";
	if (!isParagraphEnabled) {
		if (/å¼€å¯â€¢æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb)) {
			bbb = bbb.replace(/\n?å¼€å¯â€¢æ®µè¯„/g, "");
			book.putCustomVariable(bbb);
			java.toast("âš ï¸ å…¨å±€æ®µè¯„å·²å…³é—­ï¼Œå·²æ¸…é™¤æœ¬ä¹¦çš„æ®µè¯„å¼€å¯æ ‡è®°");
		}
		throw new Error("æ®µè¯„åŠŸèƒ½æœªå¼€å¯");
	}
	if (/å…³é—­æœ¬ä¹¦æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb)) {
		throw new Error("æœ¬ä¹¦æ®µè¯„å·²æ‰‹åŠ¨å…³é—­");
	}
	let cid = baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)?.[1];
	let nid = baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)?.[1];
	if (!cid || !nid) {
		throw new Error("æ— æ³•è§£æç« èŠ‚æˆ–ä¹¦ç±ID");
	}
	if (!/å¼€å¯â€¢æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb)) {
		let checkUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/app.jjwxc/android/reading/authorNovelSetting/getSetting?versionCode=467&novelid=${nid}&setting_type=author_paragraph_comment_switch`;
		let options = JSON.stringify({"headers": {"versionCode": "467"}});
		let response = JSON.parse(java.ajax(checkUrl + "," + options));
		let paragraphSwitch = response?.data?.paragraph_switch;
		if (paragraphSwitch === "1") {
			bbb = /å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb) ? bbb.replace(/å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„/, "å¼€å¯â€¢æ®µè¯„") : bbb + "\nå¼€å¯â€¢æ®µè¯„";
			book.putCustomVariable(bbb);
			java.toast("æœ¬ä¹¦ä½œè€…å·²å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå·²è‡ªåŠ¨åœ¨ã€ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡ã€‘ä¸­å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„");
		} else if (paragraphSwitch === "0") {
			bbb = /å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb) ? bbb.replace(/å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„/, "å…³é—­æœ¬ä¹¦æ®µè¯„") : bbb + "\nå…³é—­æœ¬ä¹¦æ®µè¯„";
			book.putCustomVariable(bbb);
			java.toast("æœ¬ä¹¦ä½œè€…æ²¡æœ‰å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå·²è‡ªåŠ¨åœ¨ã€ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡ã€‘ä¸­å…³é—­æ®µè¯„");
			throw new Error("æœ¬ä¹¦ä½œè€…æœªå¼€å¯æ®µè¯„åŠŸèƒ½");
		}
	}
	let token = Map("token") || "";
	let dataUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/app.jjwxc/android/reading/comment/getNovelParagraphCommentNum?versionCode=467&novelid=${nid}&token=${token}&chapterid=${cid}`;
	let dataResponse = JSON.parse(java.ajax(dataUrl + "," + JSON.stringify({"headers": {"versionCode": "467"}})));
	let paragraphData = dataResponse?.data || [];
	if (paragraphData.length === 0) {
		result;
	}
	let sp = "\ufe0a";
	let maxDisplay = 550;
	let bookName = String(book.name || "").substring(0, 9);
	let bookMd5 = java.md5Encode16(book.bookUrl || "");
	let chapterMd5 = java.md5Encode16(c.title || "");
	let cachePath = `${bookName}${bookMd5}/${String(c.index || 0).padStart(5, '0')}-${chapterMd5}`;
	let lines = result.split("\n");
	let processedLines = lines.map((line, index) => {
		let paragraphNum = index + 1;
		let matchedParagraph = paragraphData.find(p => p.paragraph_id === String(paragraphNum));
		if (matchedParagraph) {
			let commentTotal = Number(matchedParagraph.comment_total);
			let displayCount = Math.min(limitLength, commentTotal, maxDisplay);
			let encryptedParams = `${encrypt(nid)}${sp}${encrypt(cid)}${sp}${encrypt(matchedParagraph.paragraph_id)}${sp}${encrypt(displayCount)}${sp}${encrypt(sortType)}`;
			let paragraphImage = getImage(displayCount, sortType, commentTotal, nid, cid, matchedParagraph.paragraph_id, cachePath);
			return `${line}${paragraphImage}`;
		}
		return line;
	});
	result = processedLines.join("\n");
} catch (error) {
	if (!error.message.includes("æ®µè¯„") && !error.message.includes("å…³é—­") && !error.message.includes("æœªå¼€å¯")) {
		java.log("æ®µè¯„å¤„ç†é”™è¯¯: " + error.message);
	}
}
result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
islock = java.getString("$.islock");
if(islock == "0") {
	// ç®€ä»‹
	novelStep = java.getString("$.novelStep");
	novelStatus = novelStep == "0" ? "æš‚åœ" : (novelStep == "1" ? "è¿è½½" : "å®Œç»“");
	novelClass = java.getString("$.novelClass");
	novelTags = String(java.getString("$.novelTags")).replace(/^(?=\S)|,(?=\S)/g,"ğŸ·ï¸");
	mainview = "è§†è§’ï¼š"+java.getString("$.mainview");
	protagonist = String(java.getString("$.protagonist"));
	costar = String(java.getString("$.costar"));
	other= String(java.getString("$.other"));
	novelIntroShort = "ä¸€å¥è¯ç®€ä»‹ï¼š"+java.getString("$.novelIntroShort");
	littleintro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro"));
	littleintro = littleintro.replace(/ç«‹æ„\:/,"ç«‹æ„ï¼š");
	littleintro = /ç«‹æ„ï¼š/.test(littleintro) ? littleintro.replace(/.*(ç«‹æ„ï¼š.*)/,"$1") : "";
	comment_count = "è¯„è®ºï¼š"+String(java.getString("$.comment_count")).replace(/\,/g,"");
	novelbefavoritedcount = "æ”¶è—ï¼š"+java.getString("$.novelbefavoritedcount");
	nutrition_novel = "çŒæº‰ï¼š"+java.getString("$.nutrition_novel");
	novelIntro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")).replace(/ç«‹æ„\:.*$/,"");
	novelId = String(java.getString("$.novelId"));
	A =  novelClass+"ã€€"+novelStatus+"\n"+novelTags+"\n"+mainview+"\n"+protagonist+"\n"+costar+"\n"+other+"\n"+novelIntroShort+"\n"+littleintro+"\n"+comment_count+"\n"+novelbefavoritedcount+"\n"+nutrition_novel+"\n‎\n"+novelIntro;

	// è¯„è®º
	extend = book.getVariable("custom");
	commenturl = "https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+String(novelId);
	commentall = /1/.test(extend) ? JSON.parse(java.ajax(commenturl)) : "";
	cstate = commentall.state;
	
	if (cstate == "200") {
		cbody = commentall.body;
		commentL = cbody.map(P => {
			let { foldlingauthor, commentbody, chapterid: pchapterid, vip_chapter_icon, subscriptionicon, ip_pos, commentdate } = P;
			return `â€¢â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€¢â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€¢\n@${foldlingauthor}ã€€${subscriptionicon}ã€€æ‰€è¯„ç« èŠ‚ï¼š${pchapterid}${vip_chapter_icon}\n${commentbody}\næ¥è‡ª${ip_pos}ã€€å‘è¡¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š${commentdate}\n`;
			}).join("");
			} else {
			commentL = commentall.message;
			}
			A = commentL ? `${A}\n‎\n${commentL}` : A;
	} else {
	message = java.getString("$.message");
	}
</js>
